overview: Erik gets a call from his girlfriend, Anna. He has to come home to her, she wants to get her hands all over him... he promises that he will be there soon, he needs just half an hour to finish in the office. As the camera zooms out, we see what's keeping him stuck in his chair... This movie is harder than the usual SinfulXXX flick but still a perfect choice to watch together, or alone.
tagline: It gets very exciting the moment she's in charge
title: Mine for a Moment
